hanzi-su-wiki:
祉

Значения

Счастье

Мнемоника

Счастье оставаться 止 с предками 礻. Забвение умерших может принести несчастье.

Варианты

祉
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhǐ
felicity
счастье
rtega_mnemonic:
祉祉RShappiness, blessings, good luck
  • stop 止 and stand in front of the altar 礻 to pray for happiness and good luck
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 止 indicates the sound; 礻 (spirit) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
福祉 [ fú zhǐ ]: well-being; welfare
潭祉 [ tán zhǐ ]: great happiness
祉禄 [ zhǐ lù ]: happiness and wealth
降祉 [ jiàng zhǐ ]: to send down blessings from heaven
遐祉 [ xiá zhǐ ]: lasting blessings; lasting happiness
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 礻 [ shì ] spirit
    • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
koohiiStory1: And in front of every altar, she stopped to pray for the welfare of the others.
koohiiStory2: Religious Republicans regularly go to the altar to pray for a stop to welfare.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When a spirit stops protecting you, you'll have to go on welfare. If you can't rely on your family spirit, you'll have to have the help and protection come from somewhere else.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The next time you see someone on welfare, be nice. Their spirit stopped protecting them, so they need a little more help right now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While on welfare, you have to do the only job available to you: herding sheep (し). Sheep can help you out when you're having a rough time. Sheep provide warmth, wool for clothes, and even food, if you wanna get dark about it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you've ever been on welfare you probably already know about the sheep.
Ru_Notes: В основном в составных словах со словом 福祉 [ふくし], под которым обычно подразумевается 社会福祉 [しゃかいふくし] — соцобеспечение.
Ru_Words:

  • благосостояние, благополучие
    • 社会福祉しゃかいふくし
  • соцобеспечение

Well-being, but also a blessing from the show, only the sound of" " shows " like ancestor worship tablets used, " stop " elephant foot shape, this acoustic character. The word " Zhi " in the oracle bone inscriptions can be found in 5639 in "Collection", with inscriptions incomplete, Qu Wanli interpreted as a sacrificial name. According to " Zhi ", the form of " Zhi " is not clear, so Yao Xiaosui did not regard the oracle bone form as the character of " Zhi ". He only made a note: "The character is unreadable, and its meaning is unknown."

Documents Handed down " well-being " more for the welfare of the solution, such as "The Book of Songs. "June": "Jifu Yanxi, not only receives blessings." Gao Heng's note: "Blessings, blessings also. In this sentence, Jifu receives the blessings of heaven."
humanum_short_description_en: From " show " to " stop " sound, "Er Ya. Gu release ":" well-being, but also a blessing "," well-being "and" blessing "synonymous, the original meaning is a blessing.
humanum_full_description:
從「示」，「止」聲，《爾雅．釋詁》：「祉，福也。」「祉」與「福」同義，本義是福。《說文》：「祉，福也。从示，止聲。」「示」象拜祭祖先用的牌位，「止」象足形，在此為聲符。甲骨文中「祉」字見於《合集》5639正，卜辭辭殘，屈萬里釋為祭名。按「祉」所從「止」形不太清晰，故姚孝遂未有把甲骨字形視為「祉」字，只作按語：「字不可識，其義不詳。」

　　傳世文獻中「祉」多作福祉解，如《詩經．六月》：「吉甫燕喜，既多受祉。」高亨注：「祉，福也。此句言吉甫多受上天之福。」
humanum_short_description: 從「示」，「止」聲，《爾雅．釋詁》：「祉，福也。」「祉」與「福」同義，本義是福。

福祉(ふくし): welfare, well-being

從「 示 」，「 止 」聲，《爾雅．釋詁》：「祉，福也。」「 祉 」與「 福 」同義，本義是福。《說文》：「祉，福也。从示，止聲。」「 示 」象拜祭祖先用的牌位，「 止 」象足形，在此為聲符。甲骨文中「 祉 」字見於《合集》5639正，卜辭辭殘，屈萬里釋為祭名。按「 祉 」所從「 止 」形不太清晰，故姚孝遂未有把甲骨字形視為「 祉 」字，只作按語：「字不可識，其義不詳。」 傳世文獻中「 祉 」多作福祉解，如《詩經．六月》：「吉甫燕喜，既多受祉。」高亨注：「祉，福也。此句言吉甫多受上天之福。」
From " show" to " stop" sound, "Erya. Gu release ":" well-being, but also a blessing "," well-being"and" blessing"synonymous, the original meaning is a blessing. "Said the text": ".. Well-being, but also a blessing from the show, only the sound of" " shows" like ancestor worship tablets used, " stop" elephant foot shape, this acoustic character. The word " Zhi" in the oracle bone inscriptions can be found in 5639 in "Collection", with inscriptions incomplete, Qu Wanli interpreted as a sacrificial name. According to " Zhi", the form of " Zhi" is not clear, so Yao Xiaosui did not regard the oracle bone form as the character of " Zhi". He only made a note: "The character is unreadable, and its meaning is unknown." Documents Handed down " well-being" more for the welfare of the solution, such as "The Book of Songs. "June": "Jifu Yanxi, not only receives blessings." Gao Heng's note: "Blessings, blessings also. In this sentence, Jifu receives the blessings of heaven."

祉字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　祉； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页840第10
【唐韻】【正韻】敕里切【集韻】【韻會】丑里切，?音恥。【說文】福也。【徐曰】祉之言止也，福所止不移也。【易·泰卦】以祉元吉。【詩·小雅】旣受多祉。

祉字的起名意思

：本义祖先神降临。引申义福气。

祉
形声字。示(ネ)表意,古文字形体像一张祭桌,表示神降福祉;止(zhi)表声,止有住义,表示福至而不移。本义是福。

сущ. счастье, благополучие (часто в заключительнои формуле письма, где перед 祉 ставится иероглиф, указывающий на повод, по которому написано письмо)

Radicals: ネ, 止  (spirit, stop)
Meaning Mnemonic
When a spirit stops protecting you, you'll have to go on welfare. If you can't rely on your family spirit, you'll have to have the help and protection come from somewhere else.
The next time you see someone on welfare, be nice. Their spirit stopped protecting them, so they need a little more help right now.
Reading Mnemonic
While on welfare, you have to do the only job available to you: herding sheep (し). Sheep can help you out when you're having a rough time. Sheep provide warmth, wool for clothes, and even food, if you wanna get dark about it.
If you've ever been on welfare you probably already know about the sheep.
